title: The Book of the Crowman
description: It is the Black Dawn, a time of environmental apocalypse, the earth wracked and dying.It is the Bright Day, a time long generations hence, when a peace has descended across the world.The search for the shadowy figure known only as the Crowman continues, as the Green Men prepare to rise up against the forces of the Ward.The world has been condemned. Only Gordon Black and The Crowman can redeem it.
author: Joseph D'Lacey
